title: Senior Software Engineer
jobSummary: NextSilicon is looking for a talented and experienced software engineer to help develop the company’s key product. In this role you will work in multiple layers of the SW stack including toolchain, driver, and runtime algorithms. You will be dealing with innovative and challenging system architecture and will develop multidisciplinary skills by traversing multiple domains. Overall, you will gain a deeper understanding of the heart of computing architecture.

responsibilities.ul: Lead part of the development of the company’s core product including low-level SW, a compiler, and runtime algorithms
Define feature development scope and plan for successful product delivery
Design SW from scratch using knowledge from multiple disciplines and programming languages
Understand and learn a full system feature end-to-end and implement it in multiple SW layers

keyQualifications.ul: A genuine passion for fixing software and hardware issues
Strong knowledge of processor architecture (CPU/bus/subsystems/peripherals/clocks/power states)
Previous experience with reversing, compilers, kernel, OS drivers, and ARM/x86 assembly languages is an advantage
Demonstrated creative and critical thinking capabilities
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree, and/or equivalent experience in computer science or a related field is preferred
